name: AudioTracksSelection
info:
To add an audio track:
1 - Add the track to the corresponding folder in ~/.node-red/yogapod_audio/.
2 - Copy the the full filepath.
3 - Add a new option in the corresponding dropdown node. Paste the full filename as the "value" for the option.

name: Initialize Constants
func:
const light_states = {
    OFF: 'OFF',
    FADE_ON: 'FADE_ON',
    FADE_OFF: 'FADE_OFF',
    ON: 'ON'
}

const night_light_state = light_states.OFF
const wake_light_state = light_states.OFF

flow.set('light_states', light_states)

flow.set('night_light_state', night_light_state)
flow.set('wake_light_state', wake_light_state)

name: Fade Counter
Toggle Fade On
func:
const { FADE_ON } = flow.get('light_states')

flow.set('night_light_state', FADE_ON)
msg.counter = 0

return msg

name: Toggle Fade Off
func:
const { FADE_OFF } = flow.get('light_states')

flow.set('night_light_state', FADE_OFF)
msg.counter = 100

return msg

name: Fade Counter
Toggle Off
func:
const { OFF } = flow.get('light_states')

flow.set('night_light_state', OFF)
msg.counter = 0

return msg

name: Toggle On
func:
const { ON } = flow.get('light_states')

flow.set('night_light_state', ON)
msg.counter = 100

return msg

name: Toggle Fade Off
func:
const { FADE_OFF } = flow.get('light_states')

name: Initialize Constants
func:
const light_states = {
    OFF: 'OFF',
    FADE_ON: 'FADE_ON',
    FADE_OFF: 'FADE_OFF',
    ON: 'ON'
}

const night_light_state = light_states.OFF
const wake_light_state = light_states.OFF

flow.set('light_states', light_states)

flow.set('night_light_state', night_light_state)
flow.set('wake_light_state', wake_light_state)
